title: blog

content:
ðŸ“· NAC ICPC 2022, Team UIUC! who is this guy? I’m Sean, studying Computer Science with a dual degree in Linguistics at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. On the computational side, I’m a (semi-retired) competitive programmer, NLP enthusiast, and theoryhead! In linguistics, I’m mostly interested in the digital humanities, especially ancient languages. I’m a bilingual native speaker in both Mandarin Chinese and English, and can hold a conversation in Japanese; I’ve also taken a semester of Hittite from the wonderful Prof. Shosted at UIUC. I’ll be representing UIUC in the coming ICPC World Finals!
What I’ll write here and in what language are both TBD - I hope you’re as excited as I am for what’s to come!
Here’s my rÃ©sumÃ©…
